descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5]Description[/size]
[size=3]This mod simply makes Studded Armor heavy and gives it stats similar to Banded Iron Armor.[/size][/center]

[center][size=5]Reason[/size]
[size=3]I wanted to roleplay as the Dragonborn from the trailers but found it annoying that i had to wear heavy and light armour, so i looked on the Nexus but to no avail, so i decided to make the mod myself[/size]


[size=5]Extra[/size]
[size=3]If somebody really wants me to make another file that makes the Iron Helmet, Gauntlets and boots light armour comment and i shall do it.[/size][/center]
author: DatCrispyBacon
